metadata.dc:author: Gutiérrez Lizardi, P
Ramos Torres, J
Martínez-Cairo, S
metadata.dc:description: A case of plasma cell leukemia is reported, together with a review of the literature, including a summary of the signs, symptoms and laboratory findings usually present. The relationship of this leukemic state to ordinary multiple myeloma is discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Leucemia de celulas plasmáticas
[Leukemia of plasma cells].
